NeuralNetwork.Tools

Class NeuralNetworkMathFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • NeuralNetwork.Tools.NeuralNetworkMathFunctions

  • public class NeuralNetworkMathFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    NeuralNetworkMathFunctions are used by the neural network in order to store activation functions and their derivatives.
